meanings.definition: A list of movies or television shows in which an actor or director has appeared or worked on.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy looking at the filmographies of my favorite actors to see all the movies they have been in.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a detailed filmography of all the TV shows she has acted in.
meanings.sent3: His filmography is so long, it would take days to watch all the movies he has been in!
meanings.sent4: The filmography of that actor is like a treasure trove of cinematic experiences.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the filmographies of famous directors can be a fascinating journey through the history of cinema.

meanings.definition: The study or compilation of a person's work in film or television.
meanings.sent1: The filmographies of renowned filmmakers provide valuable insights into their creative process.
meanings.sent2: Researchers often delve into the filmography of actors to analyze their career trajectory.
meanings.sent3: Studying the filmography of a director can reveal interesting patterns in their choice of projects.
meanings.sent4: Her filmography is like a roadmap of her artistic evolution over the years.
meanings.sent5: The filmography of that actor showcases a diverse range of roles they have portrayed on screen.
